featured.text: In fact, a visit to a major European city just would not be the same 16 encountering them: bathing in fountains, perching on historic buildings, and flocking in public squares.

definition.zh_def: 棲息，停留在高處的地方，通常指鳥類或魚類。
definition.en_def: To rest or settle on a high place; also refers to a type of fish.
definition.example: The bird found a perch on the branch of the tree.
